title: Simulation-Based Mathematics Learning Design for Explanatory Text Comprehension in E-Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and digital environment navigation skills
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to effectively understand and apply texts explaining complex mathematical concepts in VR-based simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can derive mathematical relationships with 90% accuracy by analyzing 3D graph-based explanatory texts in a VR environment
Learners can navigate complex mathematical concept texts with over 80% efficiency (e.g., reduced working memory load) using digital navigation strategies
Learners can develop personalized reading strategies while receiving formative assessments measuring their text comprehension levels three or more times
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
